item.title: Configuration File: config.toml
item.description: This is the Engimo’s configuraion file ( config.toml ) file of this site: #------------------- # # config.toml # # # # Hugo configuration # # ------------------ # # Website URL #baseURL = "http://localhost:1313/" baseURL = "https://patevs.github.io/STEM-Notes/" # english languageCode = "en-us" # Website title title = "STEM Notes" # build directory # publish to docs for ghpages deploy publishDir = "docs" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.
